text: int arr [ 100 ] ; int adds ( int t ) { int s = 0 ; while ( t > 0 ) { s = s + t ; t -- ; } return s ; } int main ( ) { int n ; int t ; int x ; int cnt = 0 , i , j ; int c = 0 , sum = 0 , sum1 = 0 ; scanf ( "%d" , & n ) ; while ( n > 0 ) { n -- ; scanf ( "%d" , & t ) ; c = adds ( t ) ; for ( i = 0 ; i < c ; i ++ ) scanf ( "%d" , & arr [ i ] ) ; for ( i = 0 , j = 0 ; ( i + 2 + cnt ) < c ; ) { j = i + 1 + cnt ; sum = arr [ i ] + arr [ j ] + arr [ j + 1 ] ; i = j ; cnt ++ ; if ( sum > sum1 ) sum1 = sum ; } printf ( "%d\n" , sum1 ) ; } }
